name: An Alchemist's Journey
description:
Twins Kira and Sentan Languine find a love for Alchemy and healing. When offered a chance to study at the prestigious King's University, they must decide what path to take.

Explore a kingdom on the brink of collapse though they may not know it yet and decide of all that live there.

Learn Real Life Recipes

Learn about the world of herbology and its many uses to heal, clean and connect communities.

Explore Theflor

A world filled with over 100 unique ingredients ready to experiment with and combine to create new potions and items. Meet numerous characters ready to impart knowledge and gossip.
